column1: 4th  Respondents  have  acted  according  to  the  provisions  of  the  Ordinance.  Under  the  said
circumstance,  I  conclude  that  the  Petitioner  is  not  entitled  to  the  reliefs  sought  in  the Writ
Application. Therefore, I dismiss the writ Application without costs.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
